data.Sentence: --- Lesson 3 Please send me a card

data.Sentence_cn: 明信片总搅得我假日不得安宁。
去年夏天，我去了意大利。
data.Sentence: Last summer, I went to Italy.

data.Sentence_cn: 我参观了博物馆，还去了公园。
data.Sentence: I visited museums and sat in public gardens.

data.Sentence_cn: 一位好客的服务员教了我几句意大利语，之后还借给我一本书。
data.Sentence: A friendly waiter taught me a few words of Italian. Then he lent me a book.

data.Sentence_cn: 我读了几行，但一个字也不懂。
data.Sentence: I read a few lines, but I did not understand a word.

data.Sentence_cn: 我每天都想着明信片的事。
data.Sentence: Every day I thought about postcards.

data.Sentence_cn: 假期过得真快，可我还没有给我的朋友们寄过一张明信片。
data.Sentence: My holidays passed quickly, but I did not send cards to my friends.

data.Sentence_cn: 到了最后一天，我作出了一项重大决定。
data.Sentence: On the last day I made a big decision.

data.Sentence_cn: 我早早起了床，买来了37张明信片。
data.Sentence: I got up early and bought thirty-seven cards.

data.Sentence_cn: 我在房间里关了整整一天。然而竟连一张明信片也没写成！
data.Sentence: I spent the whole day in my room, but I did not write a single card!
